email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel SEA HORIZON for your 12,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai under CFR terms. The freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT.

Laycan: 25-30 September 2023.
Demurrage: USD 12,000 per day.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, is there any flexibility in the laycan dates?

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

The SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan dates are somewhat flexible, but we would prefer to keep them within the last week of September. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 40.00 per MT.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for the revised quote. We are considering combining this shipment with another cargo from a nearby port. Could you provide a quote for an additional 3,000MT?

Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

For the additional 3,000MT, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 38.50 per MT. The demurrage rate remains at USD 12,000 per day.

Please let me know if this meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

The revised rate looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 25-30 September 2023. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas
